Package StandardAgentFramework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    This interface represents an action that an agent can do.
    Agent
    This class represents an intelligent agent.
    Perceptions
    This interface represents the perceptions an agent can sense.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentOnePhaseInformation
    This class represents all the information that the environment has in a phase of the simulation: the agent object, its perceptions and the action decided.
    Environment
    This class represents the environment of a simulation based on intelligent agents.
    RunEnvironmentEventsHandler
    This class represents an abstract handler that can be added to an environment.
